segment.source: Internet Explorer Security Software Impact
segment.target: Internet Explorer Security Software Impact

segment.source: Internet Explorer Security Software Impact
segment.target: Internet Explorer Security Software Impact

segment.source: Internet Explorer Security Software Impact
segment.target: Internet Explorer Security Software Impact

segment.source: The Internet Explorer security software impact assessment measures aspects of Internet Explorer that are typically impacted by antimalware and other browser add-ins.
segment.target: The Internet Explorer security software impact assessment measures aspects of Internet Explorer that are typically impacted by antimalware and other browser add-ins.

segment.source: The assessment measures the impact of security software on the display time, CPU time, and resource utilization of Internet Explorer.
segment.target: The assessment measures the impact of security software on the display time, CPU time, and resource utilization of Internet Explorer.

segment.source: For more information about results and issues produced by this assessment, see Results for Internet Explorer Security Software Impact Assessment.
segment.target: For more information about results and issues produced by this assessment, see Results for Internet Explorer Security Software Impact Assessment.

segment.source: Before You Begin
segment.target: Before You Begin

segment.source: The first-run help tips in Windows 8.1 can negatively affect assessment results.
segment.target: The first-run help tips in Windows 8.1 can negatively affect assessment results.

segment.source: To disable these, run the following command from an elevated command prompt, and reboot the computer:
segment.target: To disable these, run the following command from an elevated command prompt, and reboot the computer:

segment.source: For best results:
segment.target: For best results:

segment.source: Compare results from this assessment to results from the same assessment on the same PC with a clean Windows image with only Windows Defender running.
segment.target: Compare results from this assessment to results from the same assessment on the same PC with a clean Windows image with only Windows Defender running.

segment.source: This will help you identify the impact of the antimalware software added to the image.
segment.target: This will help you identify the impact of the antimalware software added to the image.

segment.source: System requirements
segment.target: System requirements

segment.source: You can run this assessment on the following operating systems:
segment.target: You can run this assessment on the following operating systems:

segment.source: Windows 8
segment.target: Windows 8

segment.source: Windows RT
segment.target: Windows RT

segment.source: Windows 8.1
segment.target: Windows 8.1

segment.source: Windows RT 8.1
segment.target: Windows RT 8.1

segment.source: Windows 10
segment.target: Windows 10

segment.source: Supported architectures include x86-based, x64-based, and ARM-based systems.
segment.target: Supported architectures include x86-based, x64-based, and ARM-based systems.

segment.source: You can run this assessment on a Windows RT 8.1 system in either of the following ways:
segment.target: You can run this assessment on a Windows RT 8.1 system in either of the following ways:

segment.source: Package the assessment job in the Windows Assessment Console, and then run it on Windows RT 8.1.
segment.target: Package the assessment job in the Windows Assessment Console, and then run it on Windows RT 8.1.

segment.source: For more information about this option, see Package a job and run it on another computer.
segment.target: For more information about this option, see Package a job and run it on another computer.

segment.source: Use Windows Assessment Services.
segment.target: Use Windows Assessment Services.

segment.source: For more information, see Windows Assessment Services.
segment.target: For more information, see Windows Assessment Services.

segment.source: Settings
segment.target: Settings

segment.source: You can use the default settings or customize the settings for an assessment.
segment.target: You can use the default settings or customize the settings for an assessment.

segment.source: When you review the results, you can see whether the assessment used the recommended settings or custom settings so that you can compare results from the same jobs across multiple computers or over time.
segment.target: When you review the results, you can see whether the assessment used the recommended settings or custom settings so that you can compare results from the same jobs across multiple computers or over time.

segment.source: The following table describes the assessment settings, recommended values, and alternative values for each setting.
segment.target: The following table describes the assessment settings, recommended values, and alternative values for each setting.

segment.source: Setting
segment.target: Setting

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Use recommended settings
segment.target: Use recommended settings

segment.source: By default, this check box is selected and recommended settings are used.
segment.target: By default, this check box is selected and recommended settings are used.

segment.source: To change the settings for this assessment, you must first clear this check box.
segment.target: To change the settings for this assessment, you must first clear this check box.

segment.source: Iterations
segment.target: Iterations

segment.source: You can use this setting to specify the number of times that the assessment runs.
segment.target: You can use this setting to specify the number of times that the assessment runs.

segment.source: The results are an average of the iterations.
segment.target: The results are an average of the iterations.

segment.source: By default, ten iterations are run to give you a more accurate result.
segment.target: By default, ten iterations are run to give you a more accurate result.

segment.source: URL
segment.target: URL

segment.source: You can use this setting to specify a website for the assessment to use as part of the test instead of using the local test page included with the assessment.
segment.target: You can use this setting to specify a website for the assessment to use as part of the test instead of using the local test page included with the assessment.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: We recommend that you use the default setting.
segment.target: We recommend that you use the default setting.

segment.source: The local test page is included with the assessment and can be run without internet connectivity.
segment.target: The local test page is included with the assessment and can be run without internet connectivity.

segment.source: If you specify a website that requires internet connectivity for the assessment, you could introduce new variables that could affect the results of your test.
segment.target: If you specify a website that requires internet connectivity for the assessment, you could introduce new variables that could affect the results of your test.

segment.target: Related topics
